data.title: Duplicate Workspace Root Cause Analysis
data.summary: Three workspace IDs exist for the same project due to normalizeWorkspacePath failing to collapse double-forward-slashes and container inability to read identity.json

workspace_ids.current_canonical: project-memory-mcp-40f6678f5a9b (hash of properly normalized path, migrated from original)

root_causes: normalizeWorkspacePath does not collapse // to / after replacing backslashes
Container cannot access host .projectmemory/identity.json (workspace dir not mounted)
Container writeWorkspaceIdentityFile silently fails, leaving identity.json stale
findLegacyWorkspaceMetas path comparison fails when one path has // and other has /
Double-backslash path source unknown but persisted in meta as c:\\Users\\User\\
